snippet: The restaurant chain announced Tuesday that it had adopted a shareholder rights plan to stop Sardar Biglari, who has been engaged in a months-long hostile takeover attempt, from accumulating a controlling stake in the restaurant chain.
abstract: The restaurant chain announced Tuesday that it had adopted a shareholder rights plan to stop Sardar Biglari, who has been engaged in a months-long hostile takeover attempt, from accumulating a controlling stake in the restaurant chain.

headline.main: Cracker Barrel Moves to Thwart Biglari With Poison Pill
